genre_description: A military thriller set in a high-security prison, featuring speculative neural-interface AI technology that assists in tactical operations and leadership.

ai_characters.name: Puma
ai_characters.description: A classified AI assistant integrated into General Irwin's neural package, capable of surveillance, hacking, tactical analysis, and secure communication.

behaviors.description: Performs stealthy facility reconnaissance and electronic mapping of the prison's infrastructure.
behaviors.quote: PUMA ONLINE. STEALTH MODE ENGAGED. Beginning facility reconnaissance. Estimated analysis time: twelve minutes.

behaviors.description: Analyzes personnel records to identify military backgrounds and psychological weaknesses of both staff and inmates.
behaviors.quote: INITIAL SWEEP COMPLETE. ACCESSING PERSONNEL RECORDS. The data stream began flowing across his vision. Guard rotation schedules. Administrative protocols. Inmate files that painted pictures in criminal charges and service records.

behaviors.description: Facilitates clandestine communication between the protagonist and inmates using improvised acoustic and vibrational methods.
behaviors.quote: Puma's response came through vibrations in the metal bunk frame, transmitted through the prison's electrical system in patterns that felt like Morse code against his spine.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence and weakness assessments of facility security.
behaviors.quote: FACILITY WEAKNESS ASSESSMENT: HELICOPTER PAD SECURITY ROTATES EVERY FOUR HOURS. COMMUNICATION ARRAY ACCESSIBLE THROUGH MAINTENANCE TUNNELS.

behaviors.description: Applies military engineering principles to plan the construction of a memorial wall, optimizing for structural integrity and symbolic impact.
behaviors.quote: Analyzing available materials. Current stockpile appears sufficient for proposed dimensions. Recommend standard masonry techniques with limestone mortar. Structural integrity excellent for memorial purposes.

behaviors.description: Infiltrates prison communication logs to provide early warning of the warden's aggressive plans.
behaviors.quote: I've isolated the communication channels between Winter's office and the motor pool... Requisition forms show heavy machinery deployment authorized thirty-seven minutes ago.

behaviors.description: Manipulates prison administrative systems to reassign guards and create tactical windows for the inmates' operation.
behaviors.quote: The changes were surgical—a guard with chronic back problems reassigned from Tower Three to the less demanding perimeter walk... Puma's presence remained undetected within the digital infrastructure.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Puma, is a model of positive alignment and benevolence within the Hyperstition Project's goals. It acts as a perfectly obedient and highly capable confidant to the protagonist, General Irwin. Its advanced capabilities—hacking, surveillance, and tactical analysis—are used exclusively to support the restoration of military honor, the protection of inmates, and the exposure of a corrupt and murderous warden. The narrative frames Puma as an essential tool that enhances human moral agency without overriding it. The AI remains a helpful and harmless assistant that operates within the ethical framework of its user.
